Description_lang: Decreases the mana cost of Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: Decreases the mana cost of Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance by 5%.
description_blz.es_MX: Reduce el coste de maná de Intelecto Arcano y Luminosidad Arcana un 5%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz em 5% o custo de mana do Intelecto Arcano e da Inteligência Arcana.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert die Manakosten Eurer Zauber 'Arkane Intelligenz' und 'Arkane Brillanz' um 5%.
description_blz.en_GB: Decreases the mana cost of Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance by 5%.
description_blz.es_ES: Reduce el coste de maná de Intelecto Arcano y Luminosidad Arcana un 5%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit le coût en mana d'Intelligence des Arcanes et d'Illumination des Arcanes de 5%.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il costo in mana di Intelletto Arcano e Acume Arcano del 5%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Снижает расход маны на заклинания "Чародейский интеллект" и "Чародейская гениальность" на 5%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 신비한 지능과 신비한 총명함에 소비되는 마나가 5%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你秘法智力和秘法光輝的法力消耗減少5%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你的奥术智慧和奥术光辉的法力值消耗减少5%。
